Text: Thanks a lot, dude. The flick seems to be a cult one.

this is one of my fav films, thanks mate.

I am a huge Phantom of the Opera fan and this is one of the most original versions you'll ever see.

Neo... July 16, 2011

Hey, Neo, you're welcome for the soundtrack upload. I know all the words too!

Re: minifrepper and his/her 60's comment -- He/she was referring to the band Holy Mackerel, which Paul Williams was in during the 60's. So, minifrepper is not a bonehead, as far as I can tell. 

Trust me! :)
